title: Python for Programmers: A Project-Based Tutorial
summary:
Are you a Python-curious programmer? Learn by writing your first
project! You'll build a complete quiz creation web application. We will
cover topics from data structures and classes, to debugging and testing.

Before the day of the workshop, you will need to have Python 2.7,
CherryPy, IPython, and Jinja2 installed. Alternatively, you may arrive
at the venue an hour early to receive assistance.
